nodes.text: The Mad Monks of Xo were an organization which was "silenced" by the Trandoshan bounty hunter Bossk sometime during or before 3 ABY.

The Mad Monks of Xo were first mentioned in the short story "Tooth and Claw" by Michael Kogge, published in From a Certain Point of View: The Empire Strikes Back. They share their name with the Legends planet Xo.
